education.description: Graduated with honors in Educational Technology, Ain Shams University. Developed a Learning Management System as a graduation project.
Transform content into engaging educational with storyboards, multimedia and collaboration to ensure effective instructional design.

experience.description: Design learning experiences using clear objectives, gamification, and storyboards - ensuring accuracy through expert collaboration and content review.
Design and develop e-learning courses with Storyline 360, applying learning theories, audience analysis, and content review for quality.
Create e-learning storyboards, edit videos creatively, and design interactive online activities tailored to diverse learning styles.
